title: sedans
description: Choose a sedan for its affordability and excellen fuel economy. Ideal for cruising in the city or on your next road trip.

title: suvs
description: Take an SUV for its spacious interior, power and versatility. Perfect for your next family vacation and off-road adventures.

title: luxury
description: Cruise in the best car brands without the bloated prices. Enjoy the enhanced confort of a luxury rental and arrive in style.
